title: Is it worth it to buy an iPhone 11 series in 2020, the fact that the new iPhone is coming? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on various things. But in general, YES. Let me ask you a single question, why do you want to buy it? Are you in need of a phone for general use? I mean just for texting and calling. If yes, then buy it. The phone is definitely worth it.Are you looking for an entertaining device? For watching videos, listening to music, read the news, or just using the social platforms? If yes, then buy the phone. It operates just as good as an entertaining device.Or you are pursuing cutting-edge technology? If yes, then don’t buy the phone. It is a little out-dated now.Personally, I still use the iPhone 6 which I bought 3 years ago. It still functions as well as I expected. But if the chance is there, I might want to upgrade it.

There’s always a newer model coming. If you need a phone now, choose from the ones available now and don’t worry about it. If you like having the latest and greatest and have the money to indulge in that, you should buy when they’re first released to maximize the time you spend in that zone. But otherwise, unless it’s really close (and seven months isn’t) just get what’s there now.
